// TEXCOORD                 5   xyz         7     NONE   float   xyz
// TEXCOORD                 6   xyz         8     NONE   float   xyz

vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb5[15], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[5], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xyz
dcl_input v3.xyz
dcl_input v4.xy
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyzw
dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyzw
dcl_output o4.xyzw
dcl_output o5.xy
dcl_output o6.xyz
dcl_output o7.xyz
dcl_output o8.xyz
dcl_temps 3
// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
mov r1.xyz, v0.xyzx
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r1.x, cb5[7].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.y, cb5[8].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.w, cb5[10].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 o0.z, cb5[9].xyzw, r0.xyzw
add o6.xyz, r0.xyzx, -cb5[14].xyzx
mov o0.xyw, r1.xyxw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed -i 252fbcf2bd7f7063-vs.txt
ne r2.w, r1.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r2.w
  add r2.w, r1.w, -r2.y
  mad r1.x, r2.w, r2.x, r1.x
endif

mov o7.xyz, r1.xywx
mov o3.w, r1.w
mov o1.xyzw, l(0,0,0,0)
dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul o2.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
mov o2.w, v0.w
dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v3.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v3.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v3.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul o3.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
mul o4.zw, v4.xxxy, cb0[3].xxxy
mov o4.xy, v4.xyxx
mul o5.xy, v4.xyxx, cb0[4].xyxx
mov o8.xyz, l(0,0,0,0)
ret
// Approximately 33 instruction slots used
